Star ratings

Min, max and step (currently ½) can be adjusted via Sass variables. .stars uses SVG format so it will look nice at any resolution.

No stars

½ star

1 star

1½ stars

2 stars

2½ stars

3 stars

3½ stars

4 stars

4½ stars

5 stars

<p><span class="stars"><span class="sr-only">No stars</span></span></p>
<p><span class="stars stars-0-5"><span class="sr-only">&frac12; star</span></span></p>
<p><span class="stars stars-1"><span class="sr-only">1 star</span></span></p>
<p><span class="stars stars-1-5"><span class="sr-only">1&frac12; stars</span></span></p>
<p><span class="stars stars-2"><span class="sr-only">2 stars</span></span></p>
<p><span class="stars stars-2-5"><span class="sr-only">2&frac12; stars</span></span></p>
<p><span class="stars stars-3"><span class="sr-only">3 stars</span></span></p>
<p><span class="stars stars-3-5"><span class="sr-only">3&frac12; stars</span></span></p>
<p><span class="stars stars-4"><span class="sr-only">4 stars</span></span></p>
<p><span class="stars stars-4-5"><span class="sr-only">4&frac12; stars</span></span></p>
<p><span class="stars stars-5"><span class="sr-only">5 stars</span></span></p>

Star Sizes

.stars bases its size on the parent font-size, but you can also overtly size it using the .stars-lg modifier.

4½ stars (Extra Large)

4½ stars (Large)

4½ stars (Default)

<p><span class="stars stars-xl stars-5"><span class="sr-only">4&frac12; stars</span></span> (Extra Large)</p>
<p><span class="stars stars-lg stars-4-5"><span class="sr-only">4&frac12; stars</span></span> (Large)</p>
<p><span class="stars stars-4"><span class="sr-only">4&frac12; stars</span></span> (Default)</p>

Editable Stars

Adding the .stars-control class will allow the rating to be modified via mouse or touch. This works with any size rating.

<div class="stars stars-xl stars-control" data-target="#demo-rating">
  <input id="demo-rating" type="hidden" value="3" />
</div>

<script>
$(function(){
  $('.stars-control').starRating();
});
</script>
